# Intro.

## Importing data.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Import data.
data <- read.csv("./data/data_5.csv")
```

## Visualizing data.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(data)
str(data)
dim(data)
```

## Removing non numerical data.

```{r}
library(dplyr)
data_variables <- select_if(data, is.numeric)
head(data_variables)
str(data_variables)
dim(data_variables)

```


## Data varialbes.

```{r}
summary(data_variables)
```

## Standard deviation.

```{r dispersion-measures}
# Calculate standard deviation for each variable.
library(dplyr)
data_variables %>% summarize_if(is.numeric, sd)
```

```{r}
pairs(data_variables)
```
